instruction: looking for an intense spy movie with lots of action
output: If you're craving a high-stakes spy thriller with nonstop action, you gotta check out The Bourne Legacy! 🎬 Jeremy Renner totally brings the heat in this wild ride full of secret ops and crazy chases. Perfect for an adrenaline rush! 💥
